body:
You are accessing class method wrong.you should access using $test1->set(); and also you have closed class before set() method i hope this is typo error in stackoverflow

 <?php 
        class test{
        public $number;
        function __construct(){
            $this->number=2;
        } 

        public function set()
        {
        return $this->number;
        }
      }
        $test1 = new test();
        $num=$test1->set();
        echo $num;

        ?>
title: strange Parse error in php
